name: One Hell of a Boss
description:
One Hell of a Boss is our submission to Global Gamejam 2020
It is a Management and Platformer game where you play as Satan's clerk. 

Even though you were hired  to take control of the souls that seek to enter hell, Satan expects you to repair everything he breaks.

The objective of the game is to let the most souls go through  while keeping the office furniture in one piece by repairing them after your boss breaks them.

Controls:

  • ASD  - Movement
  • Hold F - Stamp
  • Smash E -  Repair
  • Spacebar - Jump

Authors:
Art : Maru Silveira, Nicolas de Leon and Rodrigo Noguera
Game Design & Production: Bruno Arce
Music: Ignacio Fernandez
Code: dasPanjo and jvolonte
